name: The Mission (Léon)
description:
if you encounter issues when trying to play the game in the browser, try to download the version corresponding to your OS!

Controls

[ < ] [ > ] = Move

[ A ] = Interact

Context

Made for the Mini Jam 77 and the 1-Bit Jam in 1.5 days. Themes was «Courage» and «1 button». Limitations was «Game cannot take place on earth» and «1-Bit»

The game was also designed to be playdate compatible

Credits

Made by: Léon Lenclos 2021 / Kalthoum Palace

With: Löve / Gimp

Font: MisterPixel by Christophe Badani / VTF
